content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-quote\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Note: This course covers WordPress 5. The training will be updated as WordPress evolves.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Link to page: \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.linkedin.com/learning/wordpress-5-essential-training/wordpress-an-introduction?u=2113185\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WordPress 5 Essential Training\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Prior to beginning this course, you should ensure you have set up access to LinkedIn learning.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The training is divided into 8 sub chapters:\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.linkedin.com/learning/wordpress-5-essential-training/wordpress-an-introduction?resume=false&u=2113185\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Introduction\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Watch an overview of WordPress – the free, open-source web publishing application you can use to build a blog, a website, an e-commerce platform, or anything else.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.linkedin.com/learning/wordpress-5-essential-training/how-wordpress-works?u=2113185\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Up and Running with WordPress\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Get started with WordPress by learning how WordPress works, what you need to do to get it up and running, and how you can manage your WordPress site experience via the admin panel.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.linkedin.com/learning/wordpress-5-essential-training/the-three-main-content-types-of-wordpress?u=2113185\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Content Management\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Find out about the three main content types used in WordPress (posts, pages, and media elements), and how you can manage content in WordPress, including via the Gutenberg block editor introduced in WordPress 5.0.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.linkedin.com/learning/wordpress-5-essential-training/create-content?u=2113185\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Working with Blocks in the Block Context\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Learn how to create content, create and edit links, create and manage blocks, change the block type, and so on.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.linkedin.com/learning/wordpress-5-essential-training/publish-update-and-delete-posts-and-pages?u=2113185\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Document Context\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Find out more about Document Context – this is where you control the document as a whole, its metadata publishing, and more.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.linkedin.com/learning/wordpress-5-essential-training/a-deep-dive-into-some-important-blocks?u=2113185\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Block Deep Dive\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Take a closer look at some important blocks you’ll use frequently, such as text blocks, image blocks, media and layout blocks, and so on.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.linkedin.com/learning/wordpress-5-essential-training/reusable-blocks-and-how-they-work?u=2113185\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Reusable Blocks\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Learn more about reusable blocks, how they work, and how you can create, add, and edit reusable blocks, including via templates with reusable blocks.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.linkedin.com/learning/wordpress-5-essential-training/from-content-creation-to-site-management?u=2113185\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Rest of the Iceberg\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Take the next step and learn how to take full control over your WordPress site.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Each sub chapter contains short videos that are playing automatically after you start the first video.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is a lot of information without a break between the videos it sometimes it is better to take a break between the sub chapters or whenever you need one. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Each chapter ends with a short chapter quiz.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
